resources.string: How many dice rolls per turn?

This app will help you set up the board, keep track of turns and resource generation for you. 

In the next screen you will select the order of players and their colors. Choosing more than five players will automatically enable the six player expansion. 

You can also choose a different game mode which allows partial(fairer) resource generation. In this mode, each turn will comprise of multiple dice roll behind the scenes causing partial resource generation with each dice roll. After a turn completes, whichever resources fill up will be available from the bank. 

Last but not the least you can also play the cities and knights expansion.

The next screen will track the game play and resource generation. 

The player whose turn is ongoing will be highlighted on the top of the screen. 

The board follows the catan color scheme. Red for brick, dark grey for ore, dark green for lumber, light green for wool and yellow for grain. White represents desert. In the set up phase all icons are visible, but during a turn only the icons for the generated resources will show up. 

Please make sure to arrange your board exactly as shown in the screen with the lettered pieces placed accordingly. 

Tapping anywhere on the screen will play the next turn 

Swiping right will revert and forget the latest turn.
